body.p:
Scottville Nov 24' 1862
To his Excellency
James F. Robinson
Govenor of the Comth of Kentucky

Your Petitinrs W T. Garrison and Jordan Evans represent to your excellency that on the day of 1862, they were tried and convicted by a jury of Allen County before S. L Mayan J. P. for said county and fined Twenty seven Dollars each for a breach of the Peace. Thy state that thy are very poor men & have familys to support and that they cannot pay said fine and do their familys justice. Thy say that said crime of which they were charged consisted in loud and boisterous talking that thy were not engaged in a fight or affray. Thy prays that your excellincy will remit the portion of said fine going to the state and by so doing your petitionrs state it will be a great act of mercy & clemency.

Jordon ^his X mark^ Evans
W. T. Garrison
